Lifelong Dream

This is a story about a girl who's always dreamed of becoming a knight, and her best friend who made her reconsider her life choices.

Fiamme Eterne is supposed to be my next big RPG project, but since I know how game dev is I've opted for releasing a short self-contained story about its main characters way before the events of the main game... please look forward to another additional side story coming later this year (hopefully).

Also, I just wanted to write more lesbian romance.

Playtime: Around 8 minutes
Special Thanks: My Chrono Bros, who have been subjected to my Fiamme Eterne ramblings since 2021. Y'all the MVPs.
